import React, { Component } from 'react' import "./style/root.css" export default class App extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { hourI: null, minuteI: null, periodI: false, } this.handleHourI = this.handleHourI.bind(this); } handleHourI(event) { this.setState({hourI: event.target.value}) } handlePeriodI = () => { this.setState({periodI: !this.state.periodI}) } render() { return (
12h system:
:
{(this.state.periodI) ? "AM" : "PM"}
to
24h system:
12
:
{this.state.minuteI}
) } }
